name.jp: ニーベルン・ポスター

description.en: A rare Skill Poster that allows the user to use Shadow Avatar, the legendary Billposter technique.
description.ar: A rare Skill Poster that allows the user to use Shadow Avatar, the legendary Billposter technique.
description.br: Um raro Pôster de Habilidade que permite ao usuário utilizar Avatar das Sombras, uma lendária técnica de Billposter.
description.cns: 传说可使用暴力技师英雄的技能的特殊魔法符咒
description.de: (Jobquestitem) Dieses seltene Poster ermöglicht es, den legendären Skill Shadow Avatar des Billposter zu erlernen.
description.fi: A rare Skill Poster that allows the user to use Shadow Avatar, the legendary Billposter technique.
description.fil: A rare Skill Poster that allows the user to use Shadow Avatar, the legendary Billposter technique.
description.fr: Ce mantra unique permet d'apprendre la compétence légendaire du Moine : Avatar de l'ombre.
description.id: Skill Poster langka yang memungkinkan pengguna untuk menggunakan Shadow Avatar, teknik Billposter yang legendaris.
description.it: A rare Skill Poster that allows the user to use Shadow Avatar, the legendary Billposter technique.
description.jp: 伝説の封印奥義<シャドウ・アバター>を発動するために必要なスキル・ポスター。「我が究極奥義をここに封ずる、正義の心なき者は決してこの封印を解いてはならぬ」
description.kr: 전설로만 내려오고 있는 빌포스터의 기술 섀도우 아바타를 사용할 수 있다고 전해지는 희귀한 기술의 포스터.
description.nl: A rare Skill Poster that allows the user to use Shadow Avatar, the legendary Billposter technique.
description.pl: A rare Skill Poster that allows the user to use Shadow Avatar, the legendary Billposter technique.
description.ru: Афиша, позволяющая атлету применять давно забытую технику Темного Близнеца.
description.sp: Un raro Póster de Habilidad que permite al usuario usar Avatar Sombrío, la técnica legendaria de Billposter.
description.sw: A rare Skill Poster that allows the user to use Shadow Avatar, the legendary Billposter technique.
description.th: โปสเตอร์ทักษะหายากที่อนุญาตให้ผู้ใช้ใช้ Shadow Avatar ซึ่งเป็นเทคนิค Billposter ในตำนาน
description.tw: 傳說可使用爆咒師英雄的技能的特殊魔法符咒
description.vi: Một áp phích kỹ năng hiếm có cho phép người dùng sử dụng Shadow Avatar, kỹ thuật Billposter huyền thoại.
